artist: Artist: José Guadalupe Posada; Publisher: La Estampa Mexicana, Mexico; Printer: Taller de Grafica Popular, Mexico City
creditline: Gift of Lisa and David Erickson
description: couple dancing in foreground; woman seen from back is wearing a gown with a long train; band seated behind couple wearing sombreros; text at top and bottom: "LA TIPICA. / 21 / COLECCION DE CANCIONES PARA / 1894 / EDITOR / A VANEGAS ARROYO. / MEXICO."
portfolio: From 25 Prints of Jose Guadalupe Posada
provenance: Lisa and David Erickson, Minneapolis; given to Mia, 2017
title: La Tipica (Dance Band), plate 22 from "25 Prints of Jose Guadalupe Posada"
